General.Name: Chang Lan Electric Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chang Lan Electric Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services power cable accessories and supporting products in China and internationally. The company's products include cable and smart accessories; and grounding devices. It also offers cable engineering equipment comprising crimping tool, insultation exploitation knife, cable grinder, hoist, cable car, cable heating and straightening equipment, cable straightening and pulling machine, and cable conveyor; cable fixing and connecting, such as cable huff protective sleeve, outlet fittings, terminals, connecting pipe, and wall and fixing clamp; cabinet products offer connection, branch, switch gear, and load switches. In addition, it provides auxiliary materials, including wrapping tape, waterproof belt, rubber insulting tape, insulation and waterproof sealant, and silicone rubber cold shrink. The company's products are used in power grid, power plant, subway, new energy, railway, and nuclear power industries. Chang Lan Electric Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No.223 Tongzipo West Road, Changsha, China
